Description:
Perfect opportunity waiting for you
405m2 Land (approx) with 19M Frontage
Waiting for you is this fantastic opportunity to build your dream home within a fast-growing estate close to all amenities. The Acardia estate is designed to bring the community together with its parks , shops, schools and future town centre all close by.
Currently you have, Officer Secondary College, Officer Specialist School currently open and two future Primary Schools planned to be built. You will be spoiled with choice when it comes to activities as the estate offers you parkland, sports grounds bike/walking trails and a future Community Activity Centre. All within a short drive to Officer Train Station, and the Monash Freeway. So, dont wait call us today for more information.

Description:
MODERN OFFICER LIVING
16 Juniper Street offers an excellent opportunity to purchase a stylish 18 months (approx) young residence.
On first impressions you will love the modern façade and features throughout the home.
This home has an excellent floorplan which includes main living and dining area boasting plenty of natural light. The large open plan kitchen includes stainless steel appliances, island stone benchtop, walk in pantry, double fridge space and an abundance of cupboard space.
The master bedroom includes large walk in robe with built in storage as well as full ensuite with oversized shower, stone vanity and floor to ceiling tiles. To the rear of the home you will find bedroom two, three and four which all include built in robes and are serviced by the main bathroom.
Added features include security camera system, professional landscaping, large laundry, double garage with remote control access, split system cooling and ducted heating.
Location is prime in the Potters Grove Estate and close to prestigious schools, parks, local shops, public transport and Officers new proposed town centre.

Heritage Rise, here we come !!!
35 Burgess Avenue, Officer
Goldbank Real Estate Group is proud to present an ideal titled block of land
approximately 406m2 situated in one of the desired location of Officer.
A magnificent block situated in Heritage Rise Estate, conveniently minutes travel to the nearby Officer Railway Station offers the ability to travel smoothly into the city.
Positioned well in a fantastic community of Officer and Heritage Rise Estate, this land will be prefect for someone who is looking to build their dream home.
A short drive to M1 Freeway and also located within close proximity to schools, shops, transport, medical, park lands, children playgrounds and to nearby Arena shopping center.
Everything is right with this buy from price to location to convenience.
Please contact Navii Sarai on 0435 757 768 or Vikram Raichura on 0413 396 797 to discuss further.

Description:
NEST OR INVEST!
Situated on one of the finest estates in the south east, The Arena Estate you will find this gem of a 3-bedroom family home. Close to both private and public schools and The Arena Shopping Centre with all its takeaway eateries and Coles, you can access the M1 freeway, the Princes Highway and the train station within a couple of minutes.
Step through the front door into this home and you are greeted by the grand hallway, that leads you to the heart of the home. Spacious open plan living awaits with an informal lounge, dining area and fully appointed kitchen all of which overlook the rear yard and outdoor entertaining area.
The luxury hostess style kitchen comprises a 900mm free-standing stainless-steel cooktop and oven, stone benchtops and an abundance of cupboard space. This will bring out the chef in you as you cook up a storm. Entertaining in the spacious living area will see your dinner party go off with a bang in winter or spend time in the private rear yard in summer.
The master bedroom offers a walk-in robe and full ensuite while the remaining bedrooms both have built in robes and are services by the main bathroom and separate toilet. Finishing off this home is a laundry with sliding door to outside and a double garage that has direct access to both the home and the rear garden.
Low maintenance living at its best, an inspection of this priced to sell, beautiful home will not disappoint.
Insights: 34 Georgetown Way, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2019 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Prime Spot in Primrose
This well looked after three-bedroom home located in the sought-after Potters Grove Estate in Officer, has plenty to offer. The home features a well thought out floor plan, with master at the rear of the home with walk in robes and full ensuite. The remaining two bedrooms are of substantial size, both offer walk in robes and share a central bathroom. The kitchen is a gully style offering stone bench tops and walk in pantry, an abundance of space and storage and splashed in natural light from the feature window. Outside you will find a fully paved area perfect for entertaining and those looking for a low maintenance garden. Close to all amenities this home would perfectly suit a first home buyer, investor or downsizer! Additional features include ducted heating, split system cooling, remote garage, internal access and landscaped gardens. Enjoy a relaxed and low maintenance lifestyle today.

Description:
Four years young and full of convenience!
Glistening with space and light, Bamboo timber floating floors and quality finishes, this stunning home offers four good sized bedrooms and a functional floorplan plan which starts at the theatre room/ formal living zone. The well-appointed open plan kitchen, dining and second living zone is certainly an eye-opener featuring quality stainless-steel appliances, dishwasher, oven/cooktop, breakfast bar, 40m stone bench top with plenty of preparation space and a walk-in pantry for extra storage. Triple stacker doors open out to the fabulous covered alfresco with electric blinds, making this the perfect entertaining space.
Double doors open to the master suite enticing a walk-in robe and generous sized ensuite showcasing a luxurious shower with double shower head and a double vanity. The three remaining bedrooms are all great in size, complete with built-in robes which are serviced by the main bathroom and separate toilet.
A thoughtful design to cater for all buyers, this quality Rawdon Hill family home is spacious and peaceful, with exceptional extras including; ducted heating, split system cooling, ceiling fans, sizable laundry, extremely low maintenance yard, garden shed, side gate access, internal and roller door external access- the perfect space for your trailer and an impressive two and a half car remote garage so the trade of the family can work and store their tools safely.
Positioned in the Potters Grove Estate in Officer, known for its fantastic location! Central to all amenities anyone would desire like Arena Shopping Centre & Beaconsfield Shopping complex, a variety of fantastic schools, medical centres, sporting facilities and many eateries. Set a hop skip and a jump away from parklands which is a perfect place to take the kids and pets to play.
This is a must inspect, be quick to call today!

Description:
BRAND NEW HOME! HOW FAST CAN YOU MOVE IN??
An exclusive location in the heart of Officer confirms the first-class credentials of this magnificent 3-bedroom home that represents a great opportunity if you are after a low maintenance, great value new home.
Featuring:
* 3 bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk in robe
* Two bedrooms feature built in robes.
* Open plan kitchen/meals/lounge areas
* Modern stone kitchen - stainless steel appliances
* Study nook
* 6 Star Energy Rating
* Recycled Water
Extra Features:
Double garage with internal access and large storage cupboards built in. LED lighting, security doors, Termicoat, gas ducted heating, split system cooling and a generous 361M2 backyard.
Why Officer?
* Close to M1 Freeway
* Minutes to Arena Shopping Precinct
* Quality Schools Nearby e.g. Bridgewood Primary School & Officer Secondary College
Don't delay call today to book an inspection or attend one of the regular open for inspections with Christine Quarrie Sales Consultant Pakenham and Officer.

Description:
Move in and Enjoy
Located in the popular Arena Estate a much-loved family home is ready for its new owners, a clever Rawdon Hill floor plan will keep your family happy for many years to come, with effortless indoor and outdoor living and bathed in natural light, the spacious open plan kitchen offers walk in pantry, meals area and large living. This room creates your perfect entertaining area spilling out to large deck ideal for summer BBQs and for the cooler months a gas heater to never put a dampener on your social events. The second of the dedicated living areas is located at the front of the home adjacent to the master bedroom which is complete with his and hers walk in robes and full ensuite with oversized shower. All remaining bedrooms are an excellent size with built in robes and central bathroom. The backyard is the ideal size for kids to play and perfectly private with mature evergreens. Additional features include ducted heating and evaporative cooling, floating timber floors, double remote garage with rear roller door, walking distance to shops and public transport and sporting amenities.

Description:
DOUBLE DELIGHT IN THE MEADOWS!
We present for your viewing this young and modern Porter Davis double story home situated in the highly sought-after Park Central estate, in the growing suburb of Officer.
Upon entering the home you will find the open plan spacious living area with split system reverse cycle air-conditioning, high ceilings, tiled flooring and an outdoor entertaining area which needs to be seen to be believed. Superior kitchen layout with stone top benches, stainless steel appliances including oven, gas stove top, dishwasher and a great size walk in pantry.
Upstairs offers you four great sized bedrooms, central study nook for extra space for the family and central bathroom with separate toilet. The master bedroom with double door entrance, split system air conditioner, great sized walk in robe, ensuite with double vanity and additional bedrooms with double built in robes and ducted heating vents.
Additional features include ducted heating throughout the home, carpeted bedrooms and staircase to the second floor, roller blinds with block out blinds, double garage with internal access and remote control garage, 6 star energy rating home, additional storage under the stair case, downstairs powder room, undercover outdoor area with modwood decking and security alarm system.
Ideally located minutes from the Princes Highway, Officer train station, Officer secondary school, Maranatha Christian school and Officer specialist school.
Dont miss out on this opportunity, contact Susan for an inspection today on 0448 101 746

Description:
Luxury family living on 554sqm
Proudly positioned amongst quality homes in the sought-after Arcadia Estate situates this simply gorgeous display home built by renowned Carlisle Homes. Exuding natural light and finished with warm neutral tones as well as plenty of space for all the family to enjoy on a generous sized block.
- Dynamic floor plan boasting 2 living spaces
- Stunning kitchen with stone benches and walk in pantry
- Enviable undercover alfresco entertainment
- Extensive list of inclusions and upgrades
This exciting opportunity is further complimented by its outstanding location, being just moments away from the new Club Officer, Cardinia Train Station, Schooling both Primary and Secondary, a plethora of parks and reserves, multiple Shopping Centres including Arena Shopping Centre just down the road and easy access to the Monash Freeway.

Description:
IMMACULATE HOME IN ARCADIA LOCATION
Perfectly located in the sought-after Arcadia Estate, this beautiful home is situated on a huge 463sqm2 (approx) block in a quiet street and close to wetlands and walking tracks.
This impeccable home offers a master suite with WIR and lavish en-suite. Remaining bedrooms are carpeted and include BIR's and are serviced by the main bathroom which includes separate bath/shower and quality fixtures and fittings.
The open plan kitchen overlooks the formal dining/living area and includes caeser stone benchtops, plenty of cupboard space and stainless-steel appliances.
Entertainers will enjoy indoor/outdoor living with sliding door access to undercover alfresco area located at the rear as well as secondary outdoor area to the side of the home, there is plenty of room for everyone.
Added features of this wonderful property include secondary living area, large laundry, ducted heating, split system cooling and remote controlled double garage.
Located with convenient access to shops, schools, public transport and the Monash freeway. Complete with spacious design, quality finishes and classic modern style, only on inspection will you be able to truly appreciate what this property and its location have to offer
For private inspection of this exceptional property always contact Liza Hickey on 0481 185 038 or see us at our open for inspection.

Description:
Modern & Fresh
Located in a sensational quiet location you will love calling this property home. Ideal for first home buyers or the savvy investor looking to expand their portfolio.
Located in a well-maintained area on the Potters Grove Estate this 3 Bedroom property is fresh and completed in neutral tones to suit all décor. The Master bedroom is located toward the front of the home with walk in robe and ensuite. Bedrooms 2 and 3 are situated close by and are brilliant sizes with lots of naturally light and built in wardrobes. Open plan kitchen/meals/living area are is the heart of the home and have great bench space and storage. The main living area is a very spacious area and will allow the whole family to come together for some all-important family time.
Outback we have a tidy backyard with enough space for the family pet and the growing family. Further to that the home is located minutes stroll to the park with community BBQ area and walking track. Contact Susan for an inspection or check for open home times and dates.

Description:
BEST YOU WILL SEE IN OFFICER!
Charming, private and welcoming awaits..
If you've done your homework and know the value of buying close to amenities, this is a must view. Built in 2014 this 26SQ approx. (URL) home sits a street away from the Arena Shopping Centre, medical centre, cafés, child care facility and is walkable to the Cardinia Road Train Station.
The character and charm of this home is evident immediately, with plantation shutters on all windows and warm toned timber-look laminate floors that greet you. The front lounge is perfect for welcoming guests or could be a retreat for parents, sitting next to the master bedroom, complete with ceiling fan, walk-in-robe and ensuite with a spacious double vanity finished in stone. The remaining bedrooms have BIR's and share the main bathroom with shower, bath and a separate toilet.
The main living area is open plan and great for entertaining with a kitchen that offers waterfall edge stone benches, breakfast bar, 90cm freestanding cooker, matching canopy, tiled splashback, F&P 2 draw dishwasher, WIP and plumbing for a large modern fridge. This family zone opens out to an amazing alfresco with timber floors and ceiling, overhead fan and quality café style blinds. Add to this a BBQ shelter with lighting, privacy screens and a fully landscaped and easy maintenance yard, so all you need is your friends to arrive with the Champagne.cheers!
Additional Inclusions: GDH, ducted refrigerated cooling, LED lighting, shed and a double remote garage with internal access.
Don't miss this compelling property, call now to arrange your immediate inspection.

DON'T BE A SLAVE TO RENT
Located in the esteemed Officer Estate is this meticulously presented stylish abode situated on a 305M2 block.
The home comprises of large open plan Kitchen/Meals/Lounge Area, formal lounge, separate study, 3 large bedrooms, master with walk in robe and ensuite, the remaining bedrooms are of generous size with built in robes and LED lighting.
Featuring a modern hostess kitchen with stone benchtops, quality stainless steel appliances, good storage, fly screens, roller blinds, plantation shutters, pendant lighting and single remote garage with internal access. Why Officer?
* Close to M1 Freeway

Description:
Superior Family Home Opposite Parklands
This modern and stylish home fantastically situated on a 505sqm block in the Arcadia Estate, is sure to tick all the boxes for a vast range of buyers. Offering a great floor plan that allows for easy living, the home consists of four spacious bedrooms, multiple living zones, two bathrooms and a double car lock up garage with rear roller door access. Furthermore, the home features white plantation shutters, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, thick stone bench tops in the kitchen and stainless steel appliances throughout. The backyard is also sure to impress with an under cover alfresco area which leads out to the well-manicured backyard with plenty of room for the kids. The location is second to none, being conveniently located within walking distance to Bridgewood Primary School, Officer Secondary College, and within close proximity to the Arena shopping centre, freeway access and public transport contact Jack on 0468 958 463 for further information.

Description:
Heritage Rise
Boasting a 14m frontage and located in a quiet pocket of Officer in Heritage Rise this block is a great chance to call Officer home. Minutes walk to the local park, bus stop and future shopping centre. A very short drive to the M1 freeway interchange, public and private schools you will be adjacent to Beaconsfield and Berwick with all their amenities. A quality estate north side.

Description:
Northside delight
Situated in the Potters Northside Estate is this stunning 3 bedroom plus study home. This 2 year old family home is sure to impress.
- Featuring; an impressive Kitchen with Ceasar stone benchtops, 900mm stainless steel oven and opens to a large meals and family area.
- Master bedroom with full ensuite and walk in robe
- Gas ducted heating, cooling, decking area, outside storage and an oversized single garage.
Located within close proximity to all amenities including local schools, shopping centre and Monash Freeway access.
